PropertyValue.Value: SELECT blii.line_name, bsi.station_cn_name, cbid.device_id, case cbid.box_location_type when '01' THEN '硬币钱箱找零箱1' WHEN '02' THEN '硬币钱箱2' WHEN '03' THEN '纸币钱箱' WHEN '04' THEN '硬币钱箱' end as box_location_type, cbid.cash_box_id, cbid.total_money, CASE cbid.install_status when '01' THEN '正常安装' WHEN '02' THEN '非法安装' WHEN '03' THEN '正常卸下' WHEN '04' THEN '非法卸下' END as install_status, CASE cbid.storage_status when '00' THEN '正常' WHEN '01' THEN '将空' WHEN '02' THEN '将满' END storage_status, cbid.update_date, cbid.update_time from cash_box_in_dev_info cbid left JOIN basi_line_id_info blii ON blii.line_id=cbid.line_id left JOIN basi_station_info bsi ON bsi.station_id=cbid.station_id left JOIN cash_box_status_info cbsi ON cbsi.cash_box_id = cbid.cash_box_id
